translations: 环丙沙星；环丙氟哌酸；悉复欢；全复康（药物名）

sentences.sentence: The strains are sensitive to tetracycline, doxycycline and ciprofloxacin.
sentences.translation: 该菌对四环素、强力霉素、环丙沙星敏感。

sentences.sentence: Ciprofloxacin (Cipro) and norfloxacin (Noroxin) - types of antibacterial medications - can interfere with the breakdown of caffeine.
sentences.translation: 环丙氟哌酸(盐酸环丙沙星制剂)和诺氟沙星(诺氟沙星片)——各种类型的抗菌药物——都会与分解后的咖啡产生相互作用。
